pages.title: Lotus plant
pages.text: Lotus is a beautiful high waterplant, native only to warm Lush group biomes(asian).

pages.title: Lotus flower
pages.text: Use lotus plant item to get the flower.Can be used to get lotus petals.

pages.title: Lotus petals
pages.text: Use lotus flower to get petals.Lotus petals are the ingredient of Lotus Wine.
